description: This file manages the firewall settings page for a network gateway, including UI elements and scripting for setting firewall security levels, blocking specific services, and disabling/enabling features through an interface. It contains PHP code to retrieve current configuration, HTML form elements, JavaScript for interactivity, and AJAX calls to save changes.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Retrieves a configuration string value, likely from device settings or a database.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Retrieves multiple configuration parameters with extended keys, returning an associative array.

methods.name: setFirewall
methods.description: Sends the firewall configuration to the server via AJAX for saving.
